page.title: 15THE DO_IT_YOURSELF MOVEMENT.
page.content: UP TO 300 YEARS AGO PEOPLE DID MOST THINGS FOR THEMSELVES.NOW WE HAVE SPECIAL MACHINES AND PEOPLE WITH SPECIALIZED JOBS, SO WE PAY FOR THINGS TO BE DONE FOR US. ALTHOUGH WE HAVE MACHINES, MOST PEOPLE STILL LIKE TO DO SOME THINGS FOR THEMSELVES.FATHERS DO QUITE A BIT OF "DO_IT_YOURSELF" SUCH AS CAR MENDING, MAKING FURNITURE, PUTTING UP SHELVES, DECORATING, MENDING ORGANS, FIXING OLD BOATS, MAKING SWIMMING POOLS AND THINGS LIKE THAT. MOTHERS,AUNTIES AND GRANNIES ALL DO MUCH THE SAME THING, LIKE KNITTING, SEWING, GARDENING AND MAKING OR MENDING CLOTHES. ALTHOUGH IT IS USUAL FOR MOTHERS TO COOK AND FATHERS TO MEND THE CAR, IN MANY FAMILES THEY CHANGE ROUND ON OCCASIONS AND FATHERS COOK AND MOTHERS MEND THE CAR!
